import React from 'react' import { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { getAllCountries, createActivity} from '../../redux/actions'; const CreateActivity = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const countries = useSelector((state => state.countries)) const[input,setInput] = useState({ name:"", difficulty: "", duration: "", season: "", countries: [] }) useEffect (() => { dispatch(getAllCountries()); }, [dispatch]); return (

Create Activity

{/* */}
) } export default CreateActivity
